explains: n. 任务，企业；许诺，保证；丧葬业，殡仪业
v. 承担，从事；承诺，答应；<英>在内侧行驶时赶上并超越（另一辆车）（undertake 的现在分词形式）

sentences.en: The landlord gave a written undertaking that the repairs would be carried out.
sentences.cn: 房东书面保证将进行维修。

sentences.en: Making the house habitable was a major undertaking.
sentences.cn: 把这房子收拾得可以住人是个大工程。

sentences.en: Organizing the show has been a massive undertaking.
sentences.cn: 组织这场演出是一项巨大的任务。
